thread.title: Susan
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text: Robin Sabine from Costa Rican vacations planned a wonderful trip for my family. We visited Arenal Springs and Manuel Antonio. We have a 12 and 14 yo and they had an amazing time ziplining, horseback riding, hiking, catamarran tour, snorkeling and sightseeing. Everything went very smooth from airport pickup to airport dropoff. Everyone was on time and all of the excursions were top notch with very professional staff. We were all very happy that we used Costa Rican Vacations!
